title: The Things people want
creator_credit: Jam Handy Organization and Jamison Handy
brief_description: Demonstrates how to sell in a competitive market with emphasis on the importance of product knowledge, creating the desire to own, getting the decision to buy and delivery of service or product. Six primary buyer’s interests are listed: comfort, safety, economy, performance, durability and appearance.
